sentences: Lapsed said vapparaks peale oma saavutusi.
context: The Estonian word 'vapper' is an adjective used to describe someone who displays bravery, courage, or valiance. It can be used for both men and women, though it may take different forms depending on the gender of the person being described (e.g., 'vapp mees' meaning brave man, 'vapper naine' meaning brave woman). The word is commonly used to characterize heroic behavior, physical courage in dangerous situations, or moral strength in facing challenges.
